title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and knot stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Unfinished sampler, blank at top and with isolated motifs at bottom, including a horse under a tree, a ship, and several scenes with figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and knot stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-431.
